title: What's the difference between 隅 and 片隅? - Quora

response.answer_text: Difficult… 隅(sumi) means simply or physically just corner or edge, for example, edge of a table. On the other hand, 片隅(katasumi) is much more unclear and fuzzy, for example 街の片隅（街の片隅） means a certain corner of a town, you cannot physically point out where it is.
